implements MouseMovementListener, MouseButtonListener, TabFocusListener, KeyboardListener

      • SelectList

        public SelectList(ElementManager screen,
                  com.jme3.math.Vector2f position,
                  com.jme3.math.Vector2f dimensions,
                  com.jme3.math.Vector4f resizeBorders,
                  java.lang.String defaultImg)
        Creates a new instance of the SelectList control
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen control the Element is to be added to
        position - A Vector2f containing the x/y position of the Element
        dimensions - A Vector2f containing the width/height dimensions of the Element
        resizeBorders - A Vector4f containg the border information used when resizing the default image (x = N, y = W, z = E, w = S)
        defaultImg - default image to use

      • SelectList

        public SelectList(ElementManager screen,
                  java.lang.String UID,
                  com.jme3.math.Vector2f position,
                  com.jme3.math.Vector2f dimensions,
                  com.jme3.math.Vector4f resizeBorders,
                  java.lang.String defaultImg)
        Creates a new instance of the SelectList control
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen control the Element is to be added to
        UID - A unique String identifier for the Element
        position - A Vector2f containing the x/y position of the Element
        dimensions - A Vector2f containing the width/height dimensions of the Element
        resizeBorders - A Vector4f containing the border information used when resizing the default image (x = N, y = W, z = E, w = S)
        defaultImg - The default image to use for the Slider's track

      • pack

        public void pack()
        Forces the SelectList to rebuild all ListItems. This does not need to be called, however it will not effect anything negatively if it is.
